ai.summary: A short, easy 0.7 km hike in the UK along Ceum nan Eilthireach / Emigrants' Walk that is suitable for beginners and families seeking a quick, low-effort outdoor experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a short gentle incline. The route uses well-marked paths with a gravel or compacted-earth surface, making it accessible for most walkers.
ai.safety_notes: Check local conditions before you go. Even on an easy route, weather can change quickly in the UK; avoid the path if surfaces are icy or muddy. Stay on marked trails, supervise children and pets, and carry a charged phone for emergencies. If the route runs near water, be cautious of edges and tides.
recommended_gear: Map or fully charged phone with offline navigation
